Touch.effect: Applies a 'burning' status effect, dealing 2 damage per second for 3 seconds.

Short.effect: Creates a cone of fire, hitting up to 3 targets.

Ultra-Long.effect: A slow-moving, arcing projectile that explodes on impact.

Void.effect: Adds a life-leech effect, healing the caster for 25% of the damage dealt.

Radiance.effect: Adds a healing-over-time effect to the caster.

Touch.effect: Freezes the target in place for 1 second.

Short.effect: Creates a burst of ice shards, slowing up to 5 targets.

Ultra-Long.effect: Calls down a hail of ice shards in an area.

Void.effect: The ice spike shatters on impact, causing bleeding damage.

Radiance.effect: The ice spike encases the target in a temporary shield of ice that absorbs damage.

spells.name: Stonefist
spells.description: A fist of rock smashes the target.

Touch.effect: High damage, stuns for a short duration.

Short.effect: Area of effect, knocks targets back.

Ultra-Long.effect: Creates a fissure in the ground, dealing damage over time to enemies within.

Fire.effect: Adds a magma effect, leaving a burning area on the ground.

Water.effect: Turns the rock to mud, slowing the target's movement speed.

spells.name: Razor Gale
spells.description: A sharp gust of wind that cuts targets.

Touch.effect: A small, fast cone that causes bleeding.

Short.effect: A wider cone that can hit multiple targets.

Long.effect: A fast-moving projectile that ignores some armor.

Ultra-Long.effect: A tornado that moves and damages targets in its path.

Earth.effect: Adds dust to the wind, causing a blind effect on targets.

Fire.effect: Creates a firestorm, dealing area damage over time.

spells.name: Sunbeam
spells.description: A beam of pure light that can harm or heal.

Touch.effect: Heals an ally or damages an undead target.

Short.effect: A beam that can be swept across an area.

Long.effect: A concentrated beam of damaging light.

Ultra-Long.effect: Calls a pillar of light from the sky for massive area damage.

Water.effect: The beam also cleanses negative status effects from the target.

Void.effect: The beam silences enemies, preventing them from casting spells for a short duration.

spells.name: Entropy Orb
spells.description: An orb of chaotic energy that drains life and mana.

Short.effect: An orb that explodes, draining stamina from nearby enemies.

Long.effect: A slow-moving orb that seeks targets and drains mana.

Ultra-Long.effect: Creates a zone of entropy where all regeneration is stopped for a duration.

Radiance.effect: A portion of the drained life is given to the caster.

Wind.effect: The orb can be pushed by wind effects, increasing its speed and range.
